lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: Why did Jacob send his sons to Egypt?
answers: To buy grain, since there was a famine

questions.text: Who was the person selling the grain?
What happened when they saw Joseph?
answers: They didnâ€™t recognize Joseph; Joseph recognized them and pretended to be a stranger
They recognized Joseph immediately and ran away

questions.text: What did Joseph say and do to his brothers when he first met them?
answers: Called them spies; threw them in prison for three days
Welcomed them warmly and gave them food
Asked them to stay in Egypt forever

questions.text: What did Joseph order them to do to prove they weren't spies?
answers: Pay extra money for the grain
Stay in Egypt for one year

questions.text: Why did the brothers think these bad things were happening?
answers: God was punishing them for what they did to Joseph
They thought Joseph was just a grumpy man

questions.text: What did Joseph do when he heard them say this?
answers: He turned his head and cried

questions.text: What brother was kept behind in Egypt?
What did the brothers find in their grain sacks? Who put it there?
answers: Their money; Joseph put it there
Extra grain; Pharaoh put it there

questions.text: What did Jacob say to his sons?
answers: Take Benjamin to Egypt right away
